name: Lonely Letter
description:
You are shown fifteen letters: seven pairs plus one letter that there is ONLY ONE of. Identify the lonely letter as quickly as you can. 2 Player Mode is the most fun but if there is ONLY ONE of you, try the the Solo Time Trial Mode.

How to Find: The playable executable is buried in the Win32 > Debug folder.

Known bug: The very cool custom avatar creator in the Solo play mode works poorly if you resize the window.

Created in 48 hours for GMTK: 2019.
